newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: EU leaders agree treaty employment chapter-source.
newsitem.headline: EU leaders agree treaty employment chapter-source.

text.p: European Union leaders on Monday agreed an employment chapter to be incorporated into a new treaty, a Finnish diplomat told reporters at a two-day EU summit in Amsterdam.
"Based on what has come out of the meeting it has been agreed," he said.
The employment chapter in the revised Maastricht Treaty, initially a Nordic initiative, provides for incentive measures to boost cooperation on employment between member states.
This would primarily be through initiatives aimed at developing the exchange of information and the promotion of innovative approaches, such as limited European Union backing for pilot jobs projects.
These would be reviewed on an annual basis.
